aircraft.value: Ghost Recon - AC-5764-112 at Forward Operating Base-2

defect_observed.value: Flight management system database corruption. Anomaly detected during routine inspection.

root_cause.value: Thermal cycling induced solder joint failure in electronic assembly

findings.value: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Navigation System component. Analysis of operational data indicated parameter deviation.

corrective_action.value: Implement enhanced testing protocol before component installation

preventive_action.value: Introduce protective coating to prevent environmental degradation

remarks_investigation.value: Complete defect analysis performed. Lessons learned documented.

remarks_design.value: Detailed analysis indicates design margins are adequate. Failure attributed to operational factors. Concur with findings. Date: 22/09/2023 Authorized Signatory of Design: Air Cmde R.K. Joshi

remarks_quality.value: Dept. Component inspection records verified. All quality parameters were within acceptable limits during manufacturing. Date: 24/09/2023 Signature: Eng. R.P. Singh

remarks_user.value: (Project):(if applicable) Operational usage reviewed. Component operated within prescribed limits. Concur with investigation outcome. Date: 23/09/2023 Signature: Sqn Ldr H.S. Bhatia

remarks_ordaqa.value: (Quality Aspects) Quality aspects from regulatory perspective reviewed. Investigation methodology is comprehensive and acceptable. Date: 28/09/2023 Signature: Sqn Ldr H.S. Bhatia

remarks_cemilac.value: / RCMA (Design Aspects) Design aspects reviewed from certification authority perspective. Investigation is thorough and conclusions are sound. Date: 02/10/2023 Signature: Air Cmde R.K. Joshi
